define: Update seller sku/ pre order/ model status for model.

params:
{"request_params":[{"name":"item_id","limits":"","required":"True","sample":"1000","type":"int64","description":"ID of item","key":"zxrFFEp"},{"name":"model","limits":"","required":"True","sample":"","type":"object[]","children":[{"name":"model_id","limits":"","required":"True","sample":"1625698439","type":"int64","description":"ID of model","key":"AdcQffB"},{"name":"model_sku","limits":"","required":"True","sample":"abc","type":"string","description":"

Seller SKU for model, model_sku length information needs to be no more than 100 characters. CNSC and KRSC sellers are not allowed to update the MPSKU model sku.

","key":"zbNMNY"},{"name":"pre_order","limits":"","required":"False","sample":"","type":"object","children":[{"name":"is_pre_order","limits":"","required":"True","sample":"false","type":"boolean","description":"Pre-order","key":"eBzRCQF"},{"name":"days_to_ship","limits":"","required":"True","sample":"3","type":"int32","description":"The days to ship. Only work for is_pre_order=true","key":"YtAsSGJ"}],"description":"","key":"FYBEzhd"},{"description":"

- GTIN is an identifier for trade items, developed by the international organization GS1.
- They have 8 to 14 digits. The most common are UPC, EAN, JAN and ISBN.
- GTIN will help boost positioning in online marketing channels like Google and Facebook.
- That incorporation with GTIN will also aid in Search and Recommendation in Shopee itself allowing buyers to have higher likelihood of finding one's listing.


Note: If you want to set “Item without GTIN”, please pass the gtin_code as \"00\".

The validation rule is based on the value return in gtin_validation_rule\" field in v2.product.get_item_limit API

- Mandatory: This field is required and must contain a correctly formatted GTiN number.

- Flexible: This field is required and must contain either a correctly formatted GTlN number or \"00\" to declare that the item/model has no valid GTlN.
- Optional: This field is optional and can contain a correctly formatted GTiN number, \"00\" or be omitted entirely.

","name":"gtin_code","sample":"","type":"string","required":"False","key":"ddmfXzt"},{"description":"

can be \"NORMAL\" or \"UNAVAILABLE\". Only CNSC and KRSC sellers can set the model_status. Normal models can be sold on the buyer's side, and UNAVAILABLE models cannot be sold on the buyer's side.

","name":"model_status","sample":"","type":"string","required":"False","key":"fEfHPhX"},{"description":"

The weight of this model, the unit is KG.

If don't set the weight of this model, will use the weight of item by default.

If set the dimension of this model, them must set the weight of this model.

","name":"weight","sample":"1.1","type":"float","required":"False","key":"TRzRGWd"},{"description":"

The dimension of this model.

If don't set the dimension of this model, will use the dimension of item by default.

","name":"dimension","sample":"","type":"object","required":"False","key":"axfWtJf","children":[{"description":"

The height of package for this model, the unit is CM.

","name":"package_height","sample":"11","type":"int32","required":"True","key":"YaKihHH"},{"description":"

The length of package for this model, the unit is CM.

","name":"package_length","sample":"11","type":"int32","required":"True","key":"YCMBMRc"},{"description":"

The width of package for this model, the unit is CM.

","name":"package_width","sample":"11","type":"int32","required":"True","key":"sFGfyFm"}]}],"description":"Length should be between 1 to 50","key":"YtWHkwe"}],"response_params":[{"sample":"","type":"string","name":"error","description":"Indicate error type if hit error. Empty if no error happened.","key":"sRPCmcY"},{"sample":"","type":"string","name":"message","description":"Indicate error details if hit error. Empty if no error happened.","key":"PQxyCHK"},{"sample":"","type":"string","name":"warning","description":"Warning message.","key":"XCzrPJj"},{"sample":"","type":"string","name":"request_id","description":"The identifier for an API request for error tracking","key":"WRbzYpk"}]}
